instructions: Open the Oculus app on iOS or Android. Tap the cast icon in the upper right-hand corner (right next to the bell icon). Select your Oculus Quest (any supported devices will show up on this list). Select Your Chromecast device in the "Cast To" menu. Tap start .

Open the Oculus app . Tap the cast icon in the upper right-hand corner (right next to the bell icon). Select your Oculus Quest (any supported devices will show up on this list). Select This Phone in the "Cast To" menu. Tap start .
